All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmbientLight
 
Camera
Camera class represents a camera in 3D space.
Camera.Builder
Builder class for constructing a Camera instance.
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Cylinder
Represents a cylinder in 3D space, extending along a given axis with a specified height.
CylinderTest
Unit tests for the geometries.Cylinder class.
Double3
This class will serve all primitive classes based on three numbers
Geometries
 
Geometry
The Geometry interface represents geometric shapes.
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
ImageWriterTests
ImageWriter class unit tests
Intersectable
The Intersectable interface represents objects that can be intersected by rays.
Main
Test program for the 1st stage
Plane
Represents a plane in 3D space.
Point
Represents a point in 3D space.
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
PolygonTests
Testing Polygons
RadialGeometry
Abstract class representing a radial geometry in 3D space.
Ray
Represents a ray in 3D space, defined by a starting point (head) and a direction.
RayTracerBase
Abstract base class for ray tracers in a rendering engine.
RenderTests
Test rendering a basic image
Scene
 
SimpleRayTracer
A simple implementation of a ray tracer.
Sphere
Represents a sphere in 3D space, defined by its center point and radius.
Triangle
Represents a triangle in 3D space, defined by its three vertices.
Tube
Represents a tube in 3D space, defined by its radius and axis.
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g. controlling accuracy
Vector
Represents a 3D vector with x, y, and z components.
